DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety efficacy reformulate raltegravir ( MK-0518 ) 1200 mg daily combination TRUVADA™ versus raltegravir 400 mg twice daily combination TRUVADA™ HIV-1 infect , treatment-naive participant . The primary hypothesis test reformulate raltegravir 1200 mg once-daily non-inferior raltegravir 400 mg twice-daily , combination therapy TRUVADA™ , assess proportion participant achieve HIV-1 ribonucleic acid ( RNA ) < 40 copies/mL Week 48 .
